attributes.action: Stop Vulnerable Adults being Isolated from the community
attributes.additional_details: The Social Care and Inclusion Group that runs at Willenhall Chart Centre faces closure later this year along with other Centres in the borough.
attributes.background: Groups and Activities that are provided for Vulnerable Adults in the local community are facing the risk of being closed or downsized to save money, These cuts will mean vulnerable Adults will spend a lot of their time isolated at home or having to travel further with extra costs involved.
